title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon Aurora HA and DR design patterns for global resilience (DAT442)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon Aurora 全球弹性的高可用性和灾难恢复设计模式 (DAT442)
abstract: Amazon Aurora is a serverless relational database with unparalleled high performance and availability at global scale for PostgreSQL, MySQL, and DSQL. Aurora provides managed high availability (HA) and disaster recovery (DR) capabilities in and across AWS Regions. In this session, explore the Aurora HA and DR capabilities and discover design patterns that enable the development of resilient applications. Learn how to establish in-Region and cross-Region HA and DR using Aurora features including Multi-AZ deployments and Aurora Global Database, and how Aurora DSQL multi-Region clusters provides the highest level of availability and application resilience.
abstract_cn: Amazon Aurora 是一个无服务器关系数据库，为 PostgreSQL、MySQL 和 DSQL 提供无与伦比的高性能和全球规模的可用性。Aurora 在 AWS 区域内和跨区域提供托管的高可用性 (HA) 和灾难恢复 (DR) 能力。在本次会议中，探索 Aurora 的 HA 和 DR 能力，并发现能够开发弹性应用程序的设计模式。了解如何使用 Aurora 功能（包括多可用区部署和 Aurora Global Database）建立区域内和跨区域的 HA 和 DR，以及 Aurora DSQL 多区域集群如何提供最高级别的可用性和应用程序弹性。
